fields_of_interest: Energy, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Policies to combat climate change and to reduce the emissions of CO2, specifically using Carbon Capture and Storage and Carbon Capture and Utilisation
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The objectives of ETP ZEP are: 
-    Advising on CCS as a key technology for combating climate change for all CO2 emitting industries, including  energy intensive industry, hydrogen producers and producers of biofuels 
-    Supporting efforts to make CCS an investible technology by 2020 
-    Accelerating next generation RD&D of CCS technology and the widespread deployment post 2020
